body:
Comment 13 by **dylan.p.hillier**: 
I have been playing around with go/swig on mac and thought i would have a bit of a play
with this issue.
To run the tests i copied the /usr/local/go/misc/swig contents to my $HOME/repo/go/swig
directory then ran the commands shown below:


Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:stdio gopher$ go test -work -x
WORK=/var/folders/jc/61p_6yds54nfpk1rmmt9zmp80000gn/T/go-build409299877
mkdir -p $WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/
mkdir -p $WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/
cd $WORK
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o
./_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_go_.6 -p command-line-arguments -complete -D
_$WORK ./swig_intsize.go
cd /Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio
swig -go -intgosize 64 -module file -soname
_-Users-gopher-repo-go-swig-stdio-file-swig.so -o
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_wrap.c -outdir
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/ file.swig
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6c -F -V -w -I
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/ -I /usr/local/go/pkg/darwin_amd64 -o
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_gc.6 -D GOOS_darwin -D GOARCH_amd64
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_gc.c
clang -I . -g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments
-fno-common -g -fPIC -O2 -o $WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_wrap.o -c
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_wrap.c
clang -I . -g -O2 -fPIC -m64 -pthread -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments
-fno-common -o
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_-Users-gopher-repo-go-swig-stdio-file-swig.so
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_wrap.o -dynamiclib
-Wl,-undefined,dynamic_lookup
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_go_.6 -p
_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio -D _/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio -I $WORK
./file_test.go $WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file.go
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/pack grcP $WORK
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio.a
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_go_.6
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_gc.6
cd $WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o ./_go_.6 -p testmain -complete -D "" -I . -I
$WORK ./_testmain.go
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/pack grcP $WORK ./main.a ./_go_.6
cd .
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6l -o
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/stdio.test -L
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test -L $WORK -r
darwin_amd64/swig:$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/main.a
$WORK/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/stdio.test
dyld: Library not loaded: _-Users-gopher-repo-go-swig-stdio-file-swig.so
  Referenced from: /var/folders/jc/61p_6yds54nfpk1rmmt9zmp80000gn/T/go-build409299877/_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/stdio.test
  Reason: image not found
signal: trace/BPT trap
FAIL	_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio	0.056s


#
# Test fails. Looking into the $WORK directory. Everything looks legit?
#


Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:stdio gopher$ cd
/var/folders/jc/61p_6yds54nfpk1rmmt9zmp80000gn/T/go-build409299877
Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:go-build409299877 gopher$ tree
.
├── _
│   └── Users
│       └── gopher
│           └── repo
│               └── go
│                   └── swig
│                       └── stdio

│                               │                   └── swig

│                               ├──
_-Users-gopher-repo-go-swig-stdio-file-swig.so
│                               ├── _go_.6
│                               ├── _testmain.go
│                               ├── file.go
│                               ├── file_gc.6
│                               ├── file_gc.c
│                               ├── file_wrap.c
│                               ├── file_wrap.o
│                               ├── main.a
│                               └── stdio.test
└── swig_intsize.go

14 directories, 12 files

Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:go-build409299877 gopher$ cd
_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/
Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:_test gopher$ ll
total 7072
drwxr-xr-x  3 gopher  staff   102B  9 Jun 20:41 _
-rwxr-xr-x  1 gopher  staff   9.0K  9 Jun 20:41
_-Users-gopher-repo-go-swig-stdio-file-swig.so
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff    12K  9 Jun 20:41 _go_.6
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   624B  9 Jun 20:41 _testmain.go
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   1.1K  9 Jun 20:41 file.go
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   1.9K  9 Jun 20:41 file_gc.6
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   1.7K  9 Jun 20:41 file_gc.c
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   6.4K  9 Jun 20:41 file_wrap.c
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff   6.1K  9 Jun 20:41 file_wrap.o
-rw-r--r--  1 gopher  staff    14K  9 Jun 20:41 main.a
-rwxr-xr-x  1 gopher  staff   3.4M  9 Jun 20:41 stdio.test


#
# Running the test from the $WORK location results in segfault.
#


Xeon-E8-Prototype-Mac1:_test gopher$ ./stdio.test 
SIGSEGV: segmentation violation
PC=0x7fff921b6eca
signal arrived during cgo execution

runtime.cgocall(0x2a9f00, 0x5bdeb0)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/cgocall.c:149 +0x11b fp=0x5bde98
_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio._swig_wrap_fgetc(0x0, 0x0)
	_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file_gc.c:69 +0x34 fp=0x5bdeb0
_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio.Fgetc(0x411258, 0x0, 0x118a00)
	_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/file.go:41 +0x3b fp=0x5bdec8
_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio.TestRead(0xc21004b000)
	/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/file_test.go:16 +0x13f fp=0x5bdf60

	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/testing/testing.go:403 +0x84

	_/Users/gopher/repo/go/swig/stdio/_test/_testmain.go:47 +0x9c

runtime.goexit()
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1394

swig_xxxx_.so was just built and re-run tests.
# TESTS NOW PASS!!..
